About Me

Hi there! My name is Raitis Stengrevics, but I always go by daGrevis on the internet. I live in Riga, Latvia with my girlfriend. I’m very passionated about programming and I love creating things! Currently I’m working at E-Global Trade & Finance Group, Inc. on a trading platform called Share4you.
